column1: '''Hildor''' was one of the many names among the [[Elves]] for the race of [[Men]]

column2: and contains an influence from the [[Sundocarme|root]] [[KHILI]] ("follow").<ref name=WJ/> In the [[The Etymologies|''Etymologies'']]
column3: and in the manuscript ''[[Parma Eldalamberon 17|Words Phrases and Passages]]''
column4: appears the Quenya form '''''hildi''''' ("followers = mortal men"; "after-comers")

column1: [[Helge Fauskanger]] has suggested that the unattested singular form of plural ''Hildor'' should be ''Hildo''.<ref>[[Helge Fauskanger]]
